text: Lesley Gore (May 2, 1946 - February 16, 2015) was an American singer, actress, and feminist. She has had many hit songs. She is especially known for her hit single "It's My Party". Gore was also an actress and she appeared as a Catwoman sidekick in the 1960s television series Batman. During her career, she was nominated for a Grammy Award and an Academy Award. Gore was born in Brooklyn, New York City. She raised in Tenafly, New Jersey. She studied at Dwight School for Girls. Gore was a lesbian and was in a 33-year relationship with Lois Sasson. Gore was Jewish. Gore died of lung cancer at the age of 68 in Manhattan, New York City. Her death was confirmed by her partner Lois Sasson. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lesley Gore official site * Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from New York City Category:American feminists Category:American pop singers Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American LGBT people Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Jewish feminists Category:Lesbian feminists Category:Lesbian Jews Category:LGBT people from New Jersey Category:LGBT people from New York (state) Category:LGBT singers Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Singers from New Jersey Category:Singers from New York City
title: Lesley Gore
